text: Lubnya (Ukrainian: Лубня; Hungarian: Kiesvölgy or Lubnya) is a village in the Uzhhorodskyi Raion in the Zakarpattia Oblast in western Ukraine. == History == The village was founded in the 17th century next to the Lubnya stream. Its name was first mentioned in a document in 1631 as Lubnya. In 1808 it was written as Lubnya, Lubná, in 1851 as Lubnya, and in 1913 as Kiesvölgy. Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Lubnya
